title: [Self-Directed] Strengthening Science Education Leadership Competencies through Comparative Analysis of Teacher Training Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in educational administration and understanding of science curricula
context.additional_context: Strengthening customized program design capabilities through analysis of cross-cultural teacher training differences for corporate science education program managers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cultural differences in teacher training programs by applying a standards-based evaluation system (InTASC).
Learners can compare and evaluate teaching strategies across cultural contexts in science education leadership scenarios using VR simulations.
Learners can write improvement proposals for teacher training programs based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
